name: Celestial Scalemail
data: It increases the users constitution like a god.
It has great armour class for its type (adequate in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
It increases the users poison resistance a bit.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'double attack'.
It increases the users psionic resistance a bit.
It increases the users electric resistance a bit.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'whirlwind attack'.
It increases the users physical resistance a bit.
It increases the users fire resistance a bit.
It increases the users acid resistance a bit.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'inner strength'.
It increases the users magical resistance a bit.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'parry'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'attack'.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'critical'.
It increases the users cold resistance a bit.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance a bit.
- Extra -
The luminescent vapor within the scales is almost blinding to behold.
